text: new paragraph meals and rooms tax distributions amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iv the following new paragraph of the amount to be distributed from the meals and rooms municipal revenue fund pursuant to paragraph iii up to percent of the amount distributed to an unincorporated town unorganized place town or city that is in excess of the amount distributed in fiscal year shall be used by the unincorporated town unorganized place town or city to reduce the local property tax rate
